data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, Guo-Hua, Hirowatari, Toshiya, Wang, Min (2009): The genus Crypsithyris Meyrick (Lepidoptera: Tineidae) in Guangdong Province, China, with comments on the biology and the description of a new species. Zootaxa 2310: 51-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191849
